Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

::KitKat::

She stood there and watched Land Mine's body go limp and become 
lifeless.  She let a few tears run down her cheek.  She knew from 
that moment on, she would forever know, she had to kill her friend.  
She looked up at Terrorsaur with pain and grief on her face.  She 
lowered her head and walked back into the base. 

She went to her console, she slumped in her chair, and wept.
 
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Land Mine shook her head, she didn't want to die, what did she do 
to deserve
> this? Especially at the hands of her comrade, why was she being 
treated so
> unfairly? Bang! Land Mine doesn't move as the bullet pierces 
through her
> head and goes into Deemos' shoulder. Deemos grunts and looks at 
Land Mine,
> surprised. A tear runs from Land Mine's eye. Deemos shakes her. He 
starts
> laughing and spins around, Diskus and him still back to back, he 
retreats,
> Diskus following...
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <logomorph@h...>

> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

> 
> >
> > ::KitKat::
> >
> > She saw on the monitor that Land Mine was being held more like a
> > hostage.  She looked at her rifle and sighed. She knew what she 
had
> > to do.  She grabbed her rifle and ran outside.  She looked at
> > Terrorsaur and let a tear run down her cheek.  She raised her 
rifle.
> > She took careful aim at Land Mine's head and pulled the 
trigger. "May
> > she forgive me." she whispered.
> >
> > KitKat knew that as long as one of her team was a hostage, they 
would
> > suffer.  She cared to much for her friend to let her suffer at the
> > hands of those bots who were crueler than any Predacon she had 
ever
> > seen.  She cried on the inside since she made the decision.  She 
knew
> > that this was the only way to end it.  By killing her friend and
> > ending her suffering at the hands of the maximals.
> >

Terrorsaur's
